019package org.jgrapes.util;
020
021import com.electronwill.nightconfig.core.file.FileConfig;
022import java.io.File;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
025import org.jgrapes.core.EventPipeline;
026import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
027import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
028import org.jgrapes.util.events.InitialPreferences;
029
030/**
031 * This component provides a store for an application's configuration
032 * backed by a JSON file. The JSON object described by this file 
033 * represents the root directory. If an entry does not start with a
034 * slash, it represents the key of a key value pair. If it does
035 * starts with a slash, the value is another JSON object that
036 * describes the respective subdirectory.
037 * 
038 * The component reads the initial values from {@link File} passed
039 * to the constructor. During application bootstrap, it 
040 * intercepts the {@link Start} event using a handler with  priority 
041 * 999999. When receiving this event, it fires all known preferences 
042 * values on the channels of the start event as a 
043 * {@link InitialPreferences} event, using a new {@link EventPipeline}
044 * and waiting for its completion. Then, allows the intercepted 
045 * {@link Start} event to continue. 
046 * 
047 * Components that depend on configuration values define handlers
048 * for {@link ConfigurationUpdate} events and adapt themselves to the values 
049 * received. Note that due to the intercepted {@link Start} event, the initial
050 * preferences values are received before the {@link Start} event, so
051 * components' configurations can be rearranged before they actually
052 * start doing something.
053 *
054 * Besides initially publishing the stored preferences values,
055 * the component also listens for {@link ConfigurationUpdate} events
056 * on its channel and updates the JSON file (may be suppressed).
057 */
058@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
059    "PMD.GodClass" })
060public class JsonConfigurationStore extends NightConfigStore {
061
062    /**
063     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given 
064     * channel and the given file.
065     *
066     * @param componentChannel the component channel
067     * @param file the file
068     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
069     */
070    public JsonConfigurationStore(Channel componentChannel, File file)
071            throws IOException {
072        this(componentChannel, file, true);
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given 
077     * channel and the given file.
078     *
079     * @param componentChannel the channel
080     * @param file the file used to store the JSON
081     * @param update if the file is to be updated when
082     * {@link ConfigurationUpdate} events are received
083     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
084     */
085    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
086    public JsonConfigurationStore(Channel componentChannel, File file,
087            boolean update) throws IOException {
088        super(componentChannel, file, update);
089        config = FileConfig.builder(file).sync().concurrent().build();
090        config.load();
091    }
092
093}
